publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-936 Cathy Jamieson: Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament agrees that an amendment should be made to the Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill to provide for the compulsory transfer of prisoners from Northern Ireland to Scotland and that the amendment should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-936 Cathy Jamieson: Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament agrees that an amendment should be made to the Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill to provide for the compulsory transfer of prisoners from Northern Ireland to Scotland and that the amendment should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry

S2M-936 Cathy Jamieson: Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament agrees that an amendment should be made to the Justice (Northern Ireland) Bill to provide for the compulsory transfer of prisoners from Northern Ireland to Scotland and that the amendment should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry
